nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Heroes and Villains Flip Book

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Heroes and Villains Flip Book is a flip-me-over style book written by Jason Fry. It details fifteen heroes and sixteen villains that lived during and/or participated in the Clone Wars. It covers Season One and Season Two of the animated series.
Luminara Unduli's last name is misspelled "Undulli" in her description, but in Asajj Ventress's description it is spelled right.
The word 'time' is misspelled 'tme' on page 9 of the villains side.
